name: Hi-Lo Bid Whist
description:
Hi-Lo Bid Whist is a variation of the classic card game 'Bid Whist'. Also called 'Poor Man's Bridge', it is a 4-person card game played with partners.

App features the ability to reassign player names, view previously played tricks, and more.

Adding the option of going 'Low' makes bid and declaration decisions more involved and interesting.

Provides hours of fun!
